about

Stay In One Of The Top Hotels

A sparkling newcomer to New York’s Lower East Side, the Allen Hotel features 41 modern guest rooms and luxurious suites, pairing Old World elegance with New World amenities and services. Guests will enjoy the Allen Hotel’s central location and charming cafe. Colorful mosaic murals and bright exotic orchids greet guests as they enter the grand lobby, replete with beautiful crystal chandeliers, hand-painted ceilings, marble floors, and hand-carved wooden decor from the Far East – each fixture and furnishing hand-selected to serve as an extension of the owner’s home.

why chooes us
top reasons to stay

Continental Breakfast

Soy or Almond milk, gluten free toast and cereal are available upon request. Please advise us of any special requirements in advance so we can prepare to accommodate these requests.

24 Hour Refreshments and so much more

Please consider the Casablanca your private club or better yet, your home away from home. Rick’s Cafe is our guests 24-hour living room where you can invite a friend or meet new friends from around the world.

For your comfort

When a guest of the Casablanca Hotel, our goal is to ensure you are as comfortable as possible.
UNIQUE EVENT SPACES
World-class Events
Get together at The Allen Hotel and enjoy 1,000 square feet of meeting space with two 42” TVs, a projector and speakers, plus food and beverage service – perfect for business groups or special events up to 50 guests.
For more info, email info@example.com
EXPERIENCE
Culinary Delight
With the casual convenience of breakfast downstairs, we offers a wide variety of coffees, teas, and breakfast treats. From bagels and croissants to eggs and fresh hot waffles, we have the fuel to start your day right.
Open Daily7AM – 10AM
This was our 4th visit to the hotel. Once again really enjoyed our stay. Good facilities in the room. Breakfast and cheese and wine at night both good. Like that you can have tea/coffee all day.
mathew
22/10/22
We stayed here for a long weekend and was very impressed with the hotel , the staff were excellent, very friendly and couldn’t do enough for us . Rooms were very nice, clean and comfortable. Location was a few steps from Times Square, would definitely recommend and would stay here again .
